mapper.select: select oi.*, prod.id prodId, prod.name prodName, prod.type prodType, prod.unitPrice prodUnitPrice, prod.status prodStatus, prod.stockAmount prodStockAmount, disc.id discId, disc.name discName, disc.availableDate discAvailableDate, disc.rate discRate from orderItem oi left join product prod on oi.productId = prod.id left join discount disc on oi.discountId = disc.id order by oi.id desc

select oi.*, prod.id prodId, prod.name prodName, prod.type prodType, prod.unitPrice prodUnitPrice, disc.id discId, disc.name discName, disc.availableDate discAvailableDate, disc.rate discRate from orderItem oi left join product prod on oi.productId = prod.id left join discount disc on oi.discountId = disc.id where oi.id = #{id} order by oi.id desc

select oi.*, prod.id prodId, prod.name prodName, prod.type prodType, prod.unitPrice prodUnitPrice, disc.id discId, disc.name discName, disc.availableDate discAvailableDate, disc.rate discRate from orderItem oi left join product prod on oi.productId = prod.id left join discount disc on oi.discountId = disc.id where name like ''||#{name}||'%' order by oi.id desc
mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS id
insert into orderItem set name = #{name}, productId = #{product.id}, discountId = #{discount.id}, numbers = #{numbers}
